MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut CW1 postcode area of Crewe, affecting properties in Crewe Road, Ludlow Avenue and the surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:33pm. Our engineers are on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible  by 6:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:03PM on 28th April 2021
